name: Board
description: Checking the installation of elements from the queue to the board

elements.name: User puts the house at empty cell

steps.name: The game is in progress
Game board with default preset houses board/positive/default.yml
User have in board queue [1,1,1,1]
User place on board/positive/user_place.yml
A new board/positive/result_board.yml should  be generated by user as a result of the installation of the house at empty cell

elements.name: User puts the house at used cell

steps.name: The game is in progress
Game board with default preset houses board/negative/default.yml
User have in board queue [1,1,1,1]
User place on board/negative/user_place.yml
Nothing will happen

elements.name: Checking the end of the game after the entire game board is full

steps.name: The game is in progress
Fully filled board with houses of different levels
Game is stopped

name: Combo-Merge
description: Checking the installation of elements from the queue to the board

elements.name: Combo-merge function

steps.name: The game is in progress
Game board with default preset houses board/positive/first/default.yml
User have in board queue [1,1,1,1]
User place on board/positive/first/user_place.yml
From house lvl 1 should be generated a new board/positive/first/result_board.yml with combo-merge result lvl 3 house
User gets a crystal

elements.name: Negative test to check the impossibility of combo-merging houses of different lvl

steps.name: The game is in progress
Game board with default preset houses board/negative/first/default.yml
User have in board queue [1,1,1,3]
User place on board/negative/first/user_place.yml
From house lvl 3 should not be generated a new board/negative/first/result_board.yml with combo-merge result lvl 4 house

name: Combo Merge Reward
description: Testing getting reward after combo merge

elements.name: Increase house level by +1 with crystal

steps.name: The game is in progress
A crystal after combo-merge case
Board with houses up to level 9
User drags the crystal to any house up to level 9
User gets house with current level +1

elements.name: Checking house returns to initial position at spawn place after using crystal

steps.name: The game is in progress
A crystal after combo-merge case
Board with houses up to level 9
Spawn queue [8,7,8,crystal] with 8 in cache
User drags the crystal to any house up to level 9
User gets house with lvl 8 from cache

elements.name: Try to use crystal at empty cell

steps.name: The game is in progress
A crystal after combo-merge case
Board with empty cell
User drags the crystal to any empy cell
Nothing will happen

elements.name: Try to use crystal at lvl 10 house

steps.name: The game is in progress
A crystal after combo-merge case
Board with level 10 house
User drags the crystal to any house level 10
Nothing will happen

elements.name: Try to use crystal at spawn place

steps.name: The game is in progress
A crystal after combo-merge case
User drags the crystal to any house at spawn place
Nothing will happen

elements.name: Using the destruction function at home

steps.name: The game is in progress
Random numbers of houses on the game table
One possibility to use the destruction function
User destroys a random house
The house disappears from the game table
From user takes one possibility to destruction

elements.name: Using the destruction function at empty cell

steps.name: The game is in progress
Random numbers of houses on the game table
One possibility to use the destruction function
User try to destroy an empty cell
Nothing will happen
From user wont take one possibility to destruction

elements.name: Getting the destroy function  after receiving 200 coins

steps.name: The game is in progress
Random numbers of houses on the game table
One possibility to use the destruction function
200 coins
User gets one possibility to use the destruction function

elements.name: Canceling the destroy function after clicking on it

steps.name: The game is in progress
Random numbers of houses on the game table
One possibility to use the destruction function
User clicks on destroy button
There will be an option to cancel the destruction
User presses on the button to stop the destruction
The state of choosing a house to destroy disappears

elements.name: Getting the destroy function after starting a game

steps.name: User starts a game
User gets one destroy function

elements.name: Using the destruction function at spawn place

steps.name: The game is in progress
Random numbers of houses on the game table
One possibility to use the destruction function
Spawn board with random lvl of houses
User try to destroy a house on spawn cell
Nothing will happen
From user wont take one possibility to destruction

name: Economic
description: Checking the correct payment of coins

elements.name: Getting n coins for placing a house

steps.name: The game is in progress
Random numbers of houses on the game table
User puts the house of random lvl on cell
User gets n coins

elements.name: Getting n*20 coins for destroying a house

steps.name: The game is in progress
Random numbers of houses on the game table
User destroys a random house
User gets n*20 coins

elements.name: Getting n*x coins for merging x houses of n lvl

steps.name: The game is in progress
Random numbers of houses on the game table
User merges x houses of n lvl
User gets n*x coins

elements.name: Getting n+1 coins for using crystal

steps.name: The game is in progress
Random numbers of houses on the game table
Crystal
User use crystal on a house
User gets n+1 coins

elements.name: Getting ( (x1*n1) + (x2*n2)+ ... +(хN*nN) ) * N coins for combo-merge

steps.name: The game is in progress
Random numbers of houses on the game table
User merges multiple x houses of multiple n lvl
User gets ( (x1*n1) + (x2*n2)+ ... +(хN*nN) ) * N coins

name: Merge
description: Combining n-level houses with n-1 level houses

elements.name: Simple merge-1

steps.name: Game board with default preset houses fixtures/positive/default.yml
User have in board queue [1,1,1,1]
User place on fixtures/positive/user_place.yml
A new fixtures/positive/result_board.yml will be generated by user with the result of the merging

elements.name: Negative test to check the impossibility of merging houses in different parts of the game board

steps.name: Game board with default preset houses fixtures/negative/first/default.yml
User have in board queue [1,1,1,1]
User place on fixtures/negative/first/user_place.yml
A new fixtures/negative/first/result_board.yml should not be generated by user as the result of the merging

elements.name: Negative test to check the impossibility of merging houses of different lvl

steps.name: Game board with default preset houses fixtures/negative/second/default.yml
User have in board queue [1,1,1,3]
User place on fixtures/negative/second/user_place.yml
A new fixtures/negative/second/result_board.yml should not be generated by user as the result of the merging
